Equal frequency binning

Source: R/rbin-equal-freq.R
rbin_equal_freq.Rd

Bin continuous variables using the equal frequency binning method.

rbin_equal_freq(data = NULL, response = NULL, predictor = NULL,
  bins = 10)

Arguments

data

A data.frame or tibble.
response

Response variable.
predictor

Predictor variable.
bins

Number of bins.

Value

A tibble.

Examples

rbin_equal_freq(mbank, y, age, 10)
#> # A tibble: 20 x 8
